examples.example: 请问您需要我帮忙做些什么呢？

translate.english: May I ask what you need me to do for you?

examples.example: 请问您是否有时间和我一起去参加那个有趣的活动呀？

translate.english: May I ask if you have time to go with me to attend that interesting activity?

examples.example: 请问我可以为你做些什么让你更开心呢？

translate.english: May I ask what I can do for you to make you happier?
